DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether a new model of health care for chronic patients, based on Case Management and guided by a nurse which targets the patientÂ´s risk, is more effective than usual care at Primary Health care in Chile. Additionally, this intervention would provide a better quality of care and a more efficient health provision.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of a Case Management Model for Patients With Hypertension and Type II Diabetes in Chile
DOC.criteria: Adults diagnosed with Hypertension and/ or Type 2 Diabetes Severe mental illness and / or deterioration of cognitive abilities. Severe hearing loss. Diagnosed with cancer Stage 4 or 5 of chronic kidney disease
